    • addIndex

      public boolean addIndex​(Index myIndex) throws ExceedAUException, TimetableClashException, AlreadyRegisteredException
      Adds the Index to the Student's StudentRegisteredCourses and adds the Student to the Index's List of Students
      Parameters:
      myIndex - The Index to be added to the Student's StudentRegisteredCourses
      Returns:
      Boolean that indicates true if the Index has been added to the confirmed list, false if it has been added to the waitlist
      Throws:
      ExceedAUException - If the user is unable to add the Index to the list of Registered Courses because it would exceed the AU limit
      TimetableClashException - If the user is unable to add the Index to the list of Registered Courses because of a Timetable Clash between te Index and the Student's exisiting Indexes
      AlreadyRegisteredExceptionIf - the user is unable to add the Index because he has already Registered for the Course
      AlreadyRegisteredException

    • dropIndex

      public boolean dropIndex​(Index index)
      Drops an Index from the Student's StudentRegisteredCourses and removes student from the Index
      Parameters:
      index - Index tht the student is dropping
      Returns:
      Boolean that indicates true if student is dropped from confirm list, false if student is dropped from waitlist

    • changeIndex

      public boolean changeIndex​(Index oldIndex, Index newIndex) throws ExceedAUException, TimetableClashException, AlreadyRegisteredException
      Method for user to change index in a course
      Parameters:
      oldIndex - Index that student is currently registered for
      newIndex - New index that Student wants to join
      Returns:
      Boolean that indicates true if Student has been added to the confirmed list of the new Index, false if the Student is added to the waitlist
      Throws:
      ExceedAUException - If the user is unable to add the Index to the list of Registered Courses because it would exceed the AU limit
      TimetableClashException - If the user is unable to add the Index to the list of Registered Courses because of a Timetable Clash between te Index and the Student's exisiting Indexes
      AlreadyRegisteredException - If the user is unable to add the Index because he has already Registered for the Course

    • swopIndex

      public boolean swopIndex​(java.lang.String friendID, Index myIndex) throws TimetableClashException, AlreadyRegisteredException, NotRegisteredForCourseException
      Method to swap position with another student another index index
      Parameters:
      friendID - studentID of friend who going to take the place in the index
      myIndex - The index the student is currently in
      Returns:
      true if myStudent is added to the confirmed list of the new index, false if added to the waitlist of the new index
      Throws:
      TimetableClashException - If the user is unable to add the Index to the list of Registered Courses because of a Timetable Clash between te Index and the Student's exisiting Indexes
      AlreadyRegisteredException - If the user is unable to add the Index because he has already Registered for the Course
      NotRegisteredForCourseException

      method to serilaise the database back to disk
